description: Try our easy to follow Homemade Sriracha-Style Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot sauce,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Homemade SrirachaStyle Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g fresh red jalapeños, trimmed, roughly chopped (see tip)

recipeInstructions.text: Hit garlic cloves with the flat side of a large knife. Discard peel. Process with chilli, sugar and 1 tbs salt until finely chopped.

Transfer to a saucepan and stir in vinegar. Bring to the boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes until thickened. To test if the sauce is ready, scrape across the base of the pan with a spatula. If the sauce stays separated, it’s ready. Strain through a fine sieve and store in a glass jar until serving.
